summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, and other streets and avenues, by watermains, Local Improvement District No. 3654, and for the improvement of Spokane Street, and other streets and avenues by concrete walks, Local Improvement District No. 4080, on certain property which has been deeded to the City of Seattle for street purposes.
